content.description: Just right of the corner, pull through overhanging terrain on good holds to an anchor on the upper-left face.
content.location: Just right of the Corner's Inquest dihedral

content.description: Start as for Corner's Inquest, but then before the anchors move right and merge into Afflictions
An awkward traverse above the slabby approach leads to steep gymnastic moves.
content.location: Just up the trail from the main motherland area (before Slabbage Patch). Look for a dirty slab on the left and find the bolts on the steep, blocky wall above.

content.description: Pull through a series of fun moves on sloping, fractured rock before getting to the top with a great, exposed finish on big holds.
content.location: Immediately right of Toying with my Afflictions.  The rightmost route before the cave 12s.

content.description: Wander up the slab down and to the right of the cave. Fun exposure. Lowering off the route will land you well up the trail. The route can also (apparently) be continued to the chains of "Siamese Dream" (6 more bolts?)
content.location: Starts on the blocky slab down and to the right of the main cave.

content.description:
Start in the cave uphill of the main corner.  Pull through the first few bolts on jugs with good feet, getting to the interesting part.  Then the feet get more difficult, the fit gets tight, and the holds start to get tougher to find and less positive.

Wild position with some possible chimney moves will get you to a (wide) stance and option to go right to stay on Offspring or left to finish on Hovering Mother.

The final moves felt tough, with slick feet and more jams than holds.  Pull right over the final lip and clip the chains.
content.location: Shared start with Hovering Mother in the middle of the main cave

content.description: Climb Foreplay, but at the top head even more to the right for the Hovering Mother anchors.
Climb Offspring, except instead of heading right for the anchor go straight up.
Shares the same start as Toying with my Affliction. After the fourth bolt, trend right following 3 bolts through steep terrain. Ends at the same ledge as Sheltered Upbringing.
content.protection:
7 bolts,

separate anchors from Sheltered Upbringing
content.location: Just right of Corner's Inquest dihedral

content.description:
Step through some easy moves down low on poor rock before gaining the more solid section above.  The roof kicks back sharply on mostly positive holds and has some consistently strenuous, though not terribly hard moves until near the top.  Stay right after clipping the final bolt and head for the notch to find the anchors.

Doesn't get much traffic, judging by the cobwebs in August.  It should get more after cleaning up a little.
content.location: Between Relief Camp and the rest of Motherland to the right

content.description: Start as for Cornery Bypass, but continue traversing leftwards after the second bolt along an airy traverse. Rappel is free-hanging, second must recover draws.
content.location: Starts in large corner on the far left of Motherland.

content.description: Start as for Corner's Inquest, but cut left to the bulging arete, cutting back right at the top to shared anchors
Follow the obvious corner through a couple of moves to a low anchor
content.location: In the obvious corner just downhill of the clearing and cave
